attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The people of this county ,are free to choose, which religion to follow, but, the mormons ,do,baptise our dead ,into their religion, taking away their rights,wishes and we are all at risk of having our family members baptized when we die, do you really want this,whether you are a christian , Hindu, or Muslim, we still have the right to remain so ,even after death.
 We need to put a stop to this now
